formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: When parsing a function expression, the function expression node and the body of the function both show up, but the Function node does not.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This happens because at ParseFunc[16] we use (Fd<D)Ã— to strip off the Function node, while expecting it to be there at the end further down in the code. This is wrong. Removing the above snippet of code fixes this problem, and only includes the additional Function node, not any additional, unwanted nodes.
